Content: Robert Evans, 'Chinatown' Producer and Paramount Chief, Dies at 89 Robert Evans, the Paramount executive who produced "Chinatown" and "Urban Cowboy" and whose life became as melodramatic and jaw-dropping as any of his films, died on Saturday night.
